document.full_text: however, the thai army spokesman said no official deal had been reached on a resolution to a conflict over two stone temples, with 15 dead after seven days of fighting.
document.title: asia: thai and cambodian military commanders agree on a cease-fire
lines_and_colors: however, the thai army spokesman said no official deal had been reached on a resolution to a conflict over two stone temples, with 15 dead after seven days of fighting.
